response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and dedication. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. For you, we are offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $20,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece that stands out in its class, offering unparalleled benefits and experiences. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 20000}
